title: Unlock 1,200 hidden features with a MacPilot lifetime license for under $30
content:
Macworld

Apple includes plenty of preferences in macOS. But if you’re left wanting more, MacPilot can help. This powerful utility unlocks an extra 1,200 options to play with to enhance your Mac experience. Usually priced at $99, you can score lifetime access to MacPilot for only $29.97 (reg. $99) through April 2. 

Dubbed by TechRadar as “the Swiss Army Knife that does all the user interface customization,” MacPilot is designed to offer Mac users additional control over their devices. Through a highly familiar interface, MacPilot enables users to perform the following functions: show the Quit menu, use your screensaver as the desktop, customize your dock by adding spacers and smart stacks, and more.

MacPilot also allows you to optimize and repair your system using scripts, such as cron jobs and launching services. It can even replace System Profiler with a beautiful new interface and allow users to see a complete list of network ports in use, check your RAM bus speeds, and even look up your Mac’s serial number easily.

Enjoy enhanced and additional optimization of your Mac with lifetime access to MacPilot, now just $29.97 until April 2 at 11:59 PM Pacific. No coupon required!
